caller_intent: Debbie is following up on a previous voicemail to resolve a policy cancellation related to switching from Travelers to PNC, address a refund process, and handle an email about an auto theft claim.
resolution_steps: Debbie confirms the plan to cancel the Travelers policy when rewriting to PNC and explains the refund process.
She acknowledges that PNC has already received the premium and assures Heather it will be resolved with a new check.
Debbie requests to forward an email about the auto theft claim to Heather's email address.
Confirms Heather's email is on file at myallianceinsurance.com.
Agrees to send the email and ensures the refund will be applied to escrow.
systems_referenced: Kia (possibly a client or third party)
summary: Debbie and Heather discuss canceling a Travelers policy when switching to PNC, resolving a refund, and handling an auto theft email. Debbie confirms the process and agrees to forward the email to Heather's myallianceinsurance.com address. The call concludes with mutual confirmation of next steps.
